---
title: "Life Expectancy and GDP per Capita"
---

This page examines how life expectancy changes with GDP per capita over time using the Gapminder dataset.

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px

df = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")

fig = px.scatter(
    df,
    x="gdp_per_capita",
    y="life_expectancy",
    animation_frame="year",
    animation_group="country",
    color="continent",
    hover_name="country",
    size="population_millions",
    log_x=True,
    labels={
        "gdp_per_capita": "GDP per Capita (log scale)",
        "life_expectancy": "Life Expectancy",
        "population_millions": "Population (millions)"
    },
    title="Life Expectancy vs GDP per Capita Over Time"
)
fig.show()
